thread.title: Scavenger hunt for 12s, friends of KIRO 7
thread.title_full: Scavenger hunt for 12s, friends of KIRO 7 | www.kirotv.com

author: kirotv.com
title: Scavenger hunt for 12s, friends of KIRO 7
text:
Attention all 12s and treasure hunters!
KIRO 7 is celebrating the 50th anniversary of football’s biggest game with the Golden Ticket Giveaway, presented by Bellevue Rare Coins.
All you have to do to win a trip to the BIG EVENT in San Francisco is follow the clues on KIRO 7’s social media sites to find the Golden Ticket!
Want to play? Here’s how:
Follow the KIRO 7 social media pages – Facebook , Twitter and Instagram – every Friday. We will post three clues to the treasure - at 11:50 a.m., 12:50 p.m. and 1:50 p.m. And here’s a hint: Watch the Steve Raible Scouting Report every Thursday Night (it airs at 10 p.m. this Thursday) for an additional clue that will help you find the destination!>
When you have an idea where the Golden Ticket has been placed around the Greater Seattle area, find the KIRO 7 team at the secret location before the deadline at 3 p.m.
